Title: A Shaun the Sheep Movie: Farmageddon
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Jon Brown, Mark Burton (story by), Mark Burton, Nick Park (characters), Nick Park (story by)
Actors: Justin Fletcher, Joe Sugg, John Sparkes, Kate Harbour
Plot: When an alien with amazing powers crash-lands near Mossy Bottom Farm, Shaun the Sheep goes on a mission to shepherd the intergalactic visitor home before a sinister organization can capture her.
